analysis.description:
CommonSale.mintTokens (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#402-404) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#403-404)
	-token.transfer(to,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#404)

RetrieveTokensFeature.retrieveTokens (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#492-499) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(to,alienToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#497-499)

Mainsale.finish (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#631-661) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#661)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x53507e1c859463e6c2677c4c8be3e5ee05b2846e.sol#1): it allows old versions
